name: Argousze
description:
Short story that happens to be still unfinished, made for Shoot For The Stars Jam.

There's a story about an alien invasion that was supposed to happen one day. No one saw them, however, no matter how long he waited. And so it was forgotten. Now our group of young geniuses historians and researchers is proud to present the embroidered documentary about what happened, based on painstakingly gathered materials and years of field experience.

Only for personal use because we believe you'll keep those files confidential.

Features:

- Estimated gameplay: about 10-15 minutes

- 1 ending and one cliffhanger

- Monochrome low effort art made to save time

- Aliens [only one for now, sry]

- Lots of nonsense

- 1280x960

- No music, no sound effects, no nothing [will be added later]

__________ Credits __________

Practically everything besides music:

Awiola
